definition[0]: the additional effectiveness when two or more companies or people combine and work together
definition[1]: additional advantages, profits etc that are produced by two people or organizations combining their ideas and RESOURCEs (=means to achieve their aims)
example[0]: The new group has problems with achieving the desired synergy among its varied operations.
example[1]: The companies could benefit from cost savings, as well as synergies from combining their manufacturing activities.
